1.name: Arokya Full Cream Milk
1.description: Arokya Full Cream Milk is rich, creamy, and wholesome, packed with essential nutrients like protein and calcium. Sourced from trusted farmers and processed with the highest standards of purity, it delivers natural goodness and great taste, making it ideal for the whole family.

2.name: Arokya Standardised Milk
2.description: Arokya Standardised Milk provides a balanced taste and nutrition, standardized to 4.5% fat, suitable for everyday consumption in tea, coffee, or cooking.

3.name: Arokya Full Toned Milk
3.description: Arokya Full Toned Milk is a lighter milk with 3% fat, nutritious and refreshing, ideal for health-conscious families looking for a balanced diet.

4.name: Arokya Double Toned Milk
4.description: Arokya Double Toned Milk is a low-fat milk variant that contains 1.5% fat, offering a healthy and nutritious option for weight-conscious consumers.

5.name: Arokya Curd 125g
5.description: Arokya Curd 125g is smooth and creamy, made from pure toned milk, naturally fermented to offer probiotics that aid digestion and boost immunity.

6.name: Arokya Curd 500g
6.description: Arokya Curd 500g offers a wholesome portion of fresh, creamy curd with live cultures that promote digestive health and provide a rich taste.

7.name: Arokya Paneer
7.description: Arokya Paneer is handmade traditional cottage cheese, soft and fresh, ideal for delicious Indian curries and snacks.

8.name: Arokya Ghee
8.description: Arokya Ghee is pure clarified butter made by simmering fresh cream, rich in aroma and essential fatty acids, perfect for cooking and traditional recipes.

9.name: Arokya Cheese
9.description: Arokya Cheese is a smooth, creamy cheese made from pure milk, perfect for sandwiches, salads, and cooking.

details.Ingredients: Pasteurized cow’s milk, bacterial cultures, salt
